content:
Goal: save our time by automating mental work with bots & language tech
Hobbies: meditation & learning machine learning
Recent Projects:
Hive Search
 provides semantic search and similar posts for Hive content blockchain (1.5 TB of data) built with Elasticsearch, Kubernetes, AWS services more: https://github.com/owenburton/hivesearch (work in progress)  QuickSlack Knowledge Management System
 created semantic search and contextual auto-suggestion for Slack using a chatbot built with Pytorch, Transformers, Annoy index, Docker swarm served large, fine-tuned, transformer-based language models and approximate nearest-neighbors search indexes (Spotifyâ€™s Annoy implementation) more: https://github.com/owenburton/Quick-Slack-ds (work in progress)  Scholar Stats
 deliver more meaningful profiles statistics by scraping and wrangling data from Google Scholar profiles built with Selenium, Streamlit, Altair, Pandas more: https://github.com/owenburton/scholar-stats (work in progress)
